intro:
Step into a combat-free Metroidvania world where your adventure revolves around exploration, puzzle-solving, and treasure hunt. 

Feature
- Easy to learn, hard to master
- Story with mystery 
- No combat 

Time to 100%: 4 hours 

We provide: 
- Solving the platform puzzle with player creativity, more than 1 solution in most places
- Unlock abilities in different sequence can provide difference gameplay and experience 
- accumulated knowledge allows more efficient speedrunnings  
- Bonus content to reward player who clear the game within a period of game
